example.eg: Marta is a good worker, but when it comes to overtime, she isn't capable because she gets fatigued quickly.
example.egtrans: 玛塔是一个好员工，但是容易疲倦，所以没有加班的能力。

example.eg: Annie is very capable as a researcher.
example.egtrans: 安妮是一位非常有能力的研究员。

example.eg: Brad doesn't seem capable of murder, in my opinion.
example.egtrans: 我认为布拉德看上去不具备谋杀的行为能力。

example.eg: My little boy isn't capable of tying his own shoelaces yet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有能力做, 能够做到

example.eg: I am confident that this problem is capable of resolution.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 易于…的, 有…倾向的, 能做到...的

example.eg: Although a highly capable politician, on this occasion he completely misjudged the mood of the electorate.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 能力出众的, 能力强的
